ygData.subject: Re: blacksmithing
ygData.msgSnippet: I read that making skewers was a very good way to raise your blacksmithing to master level. and not as expensive as most things. I would ask this on the
ygData.messageBody:
I read that making skewers was a very good way to raise your blacksmithing
to master level. and not as expensive as most things.



I would ask this on the blacksmithing list but I think they are against
cheats over there, so here it goes. I was wondering how to raise
blacksmithing the fastest? I know it would take a lot of money, but as of
right now, I know of 3 people that can make banded. I am sure there is more,
but for an entire world, that is no good. Good for them, but not for everyone
else. I would like to become a good smith, and make banded. I have 24 in the
smithing skill now. I have tried just to keep making studs, as you still gain
skill for failing, but is there anything else that would raise it faster? Any
cheats as this is what this list is about?

Thanks,
Sarn, Veeshan Server
